sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; function DisplayWeather(props) { const { data } = props; const iconurl = "http://openweathermap.org/img/wn/" + `${data.cod != 404 ? data.weather[0].icon : null}` + ".png"; // my edition const demo = data.weather[0].main; return (
{data.cod != 404 ? ( <>
{data.name} , {data.sys.country}. Weather As of {new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}

{" "} {Math.floor(data.main.temp - 273.15)} o

{demo} {" "} {data.weather[0].description}
{/*

High/Low

 {Math.floor(data.main.temp_max - 273.15)}/ {Math.floor(data.main.temp_min - 273.15)}

Humidity

 {data.main.humidity} %

Pressure

 {data.main.pressure} hPa

Visibility

 {data.visibility / 1000} Km

Wind

 {Math.floor((data.wind.speed * 18) / 5)} km/hr

Wind Direction

 {data.wind.deg} o deg

Sunrise

 {new Date(data.sys.sunrise * 1000).toLocaleTimeString()}

Sunset

 {new Date(data.sys.sunset * 1000).toLocaleTimeString()}
*/}
{Math.floor(data.main.temp_max - 273.15)}/ {Math.floor(data.main.temp_min - 273.15)} {data.main.humidity} % {data.main.pressure} hPa {data.visibility / 1000} Km {Math.floor((data.wind.speed * 18) / 5)} km/hr {data.wind.deg} o deg {new Date(data.sys.sunrise * 1000).toLocaleTimeString()} {new Date(data.sys.sunset * 1000).toLocaleTimeString()}
) : (

{data.message}

)}
); } export default DisplayWeather;
